Articles.Content: Rescue Contract: Save Andred Kerman stranded in orbit above Minmus. I grab him on a return trip, splash down and retrieve. Save and exit the game. I return and my save and last autosave both say I've failed and Andred was lost. But hes not lost, hes on my roster. I just put his green behind on another mission. What's going on here and if it IS a bug, can I edit my savefile so I dont have that unfair blemish on my record?
Failed contracts will not be saved to .sfs anyway (at least for 1.0.5). That is, even if you deliberately fail, then save, then load, you'll not see it anywhere.
Except I didn't fail. I only noticed it stated I failed after I had started the game again.
That does sound like a bug, so your thread has been moved to the support section.
